beer.beer_description: Cornish malts provide the perfect base to this beautifully balanced pale ale. What else would you find in a classic Nicholson’s ale but quintessentially British Fuggles and Goldings hops, along with the stunning Australian variety, Galaxy. The addition of Galaxy hops adds a whole new dimension to this fabulous brew, bringing a fruity twist to both the taste and the aroma, giving it a truly unique character.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 350 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 190 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 39.
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 35 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 8.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 20 distinct venues!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 10 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 380 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 77!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 110 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 23!

user.bio: From Cumbria ....first started on real ale about 15 yrs ago, now trying it across the globe

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 435 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 140 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 29!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 130 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 27!
